totem/addon/mixins/cache/paginate.coffee
Back to Guides
import ember from 'ember' import pagination_array from 'totem-application/pagination/array' export default ember.Mixin.create add_pagination_to_query: (query, number, size=15) -> query.page = @get_pagination_options(number, size) query get_default_pagination_query: -> query = {} query.page = @get_pagination_options(1) query get_pagination_options: (number, size=15) -> {number: number, size: size} get_paginated_array: (type, payload) -> array = pagination_array.create() array.process_pagination_payload(payload, type) array
